text: The International Islamic University Malaysia (; ), also known as IIUM, is a public university in Malaysia. Its main building is in Gombak, Selangor. It has six other campuses all over Malaysia: two medical-centric campuses and a Centre for Foundation Studies in Gambang, Pahang, two city campuses in Kuala Lumpur, and a language & tourism campus in Pagoh, Johor. ==References== Category:Colleges and universities in Malaysia Category:Selangor
title: International Islamic University Malaysia
